short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get Ready Challenge your brain! Test your memory, typing, and pi-reciting skills in this game. Can you reach the top level?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ready to challenge your brain? This game will put your memory, typing, and pi-reciting skills to the test.
The game starts with a few digits and gradually increases in difficulty as the player progresses through the levels.

Whether you're looking for a quick mental workout or a fun way to test your skills, this game offers a challenging and engaging experience that is sure to keep you coming back for more. So, are you ready to take on the challenge and see how far you can go?

Can you graduate from the PI University? Install the extension to find out!
